title: Sell Talisker Scotch
metaDescription: Sell your Talisker whisky. We buy 25 Year, 30 Year, 40+ Year, and older 10 Year releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy rare Talisker from the Isle of Skye.
introParagraph: Talisker is the iconic distillery of the Isle of Skye. We purchase their premium age-statement whiskies, including Talisker 18, 25, 30, and 40+ year old releases. We also look for limited editions like the 8 Year Special Releases and older 'Map Label' 10 Year bottlings.
whatWeBuy: Talisker Special Releases (8 Year Cask Strength)
conditionFactors: Box condition is key for 25/30 year releases
pricingFactors: Bottling year (older 25/30 year bottlings at cask strength are more valuable)

faqs.question: Is current Talisker 18 valuable?
faqs.answer: It is a premium bottle, but older packaging versions of the 18 Year are more collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy Talisker 10 Year?
faqs.answer: Only if it is an older 'Map Label' bottling or earlier.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 8 Year Special Release?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the cask strength annual 8 Year releases.

faqs.question: Do you buy Distillers Edition?
faqs.answer: We buy older Distillers Editions (pre-2015) but generally pass on recent ones unless part of a group.

faqs.question: How do I ship the 30 Year box?
faqs.answer: The box is valuable. Protect it well with bubble wrap to prevent corner damage.

faqs.question: Do you buy Talisker Xpedition Oak?
faqs.answer: Yes, we purchase the 43 Year Xpedition Oak and similar high-end releases.
